summary: Texture mod that replaces the earth dragon with a beautiful red dragon.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/7518/screenshot437t.jpg[/img]

I think it turned out so well I thought I\'d share it.

This replaces the earth dragon.

To Install:
Copy and paste the textures folder inside to your Skyrim data folder

To uninstall:
Navigate to: \\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\dragon

Delete dragon_earth.dds and dragon_earth_n.dds
author: LoganGFX
